title: Lazada Onsite Campaign Report
description: A JSON object representing a Lazada onsite campaign report for a specific campaign.

Date.description: The date of the campaign report in 'dd-MM-yyyy' format.

Campaign_ID.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

Campaign_Objective.description: The objective of the campaign, such as 'Traffic' or 'Sales'.

Campaign_Type.description: The type of campaign, e.g., 'Automated' or 'Manual'.

Placement.description: The placement and targeting for the campaign, e.g., 'All - Sponsored Products'.

Budget.description: The campaign budget with currency information.

Spend.description: The campaign spend with currency information.

Impression.description: The number of times the campaign's ads were displayed.

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the campaign's ads.

CTR.description: The Click-Through Rate (CTR) for the campaign, expressed as a percentage.

CPC.description: The cost per click (CPC) with currency information.

Add_To_Cart_Units.description: The number of units added to the cart during the campaign.

Orders.description: The total number of orders generated as a result of the campaign.

CVR.description: The Conversion Rate (CVR) for the campaign, expressed as a percentage.

Units_Sold.description: The total number of units sold during the campaign.

Revenue.description: The revenue generated from the campaign.

ROAS.description: The Return on Ad Spend (ROAS) for the campaign, indicating the revenue generated per unit of ad spend.

Direct_Add_To_Cart_Units.description: The number of units directly added to the cart due to the campaign.

Direct_Orders.description: The number of direct orders generated as a result of the campaign.

Direct_CVR.description: The Conversion Rate (CVR) for direct conversions, expressed as a percentage.

Direct_Units_Sold.description: The total number of units directly sold during the campaign.

Direct_Revenue.description: The direct revenue with currency information.
